CYCAD: Oeno, I write to you from my voyager within the Sanctuary: I request urgent assistance in locating a native lifeform that escaped from the Sanctuary!
2
1
CYCAD: I disengaged the voyager stone briefly by accident - allowing the quantum shard to slip from my sight, along with one of the native lifeforms resting on it!
3 2
OENO: When the shard returned, its passenger was gone! We must locate and rescue this runaway before the Ash Twin Project begins to spare it from a terrible fate!
4
3
OENO: I have located and delivered our four-eyed friend back into the Sanctuary, Cycad!
5
3
OENO: But Cycad, you should be able to entangle with and travel using the quantum shard, even as a voyager. If any more escapes occur, I implore you to take matters into your own hands!
6
5
CYCAD: But the surface of the planet is never dark enough for one to travel to using the quantum shard. I do not see how..
7
6
CYCAD: Ah, I see! A voyager lacks sentience, and so lacks the ability to observe its surroundings on its own..
8
7
CYCAD: That said, it is rather tiresome waiting within the Sanctuary for the quantum shard to return.. I wish it wasn't only able to travel inside under the cover of darkness!
